results.text: I tid ixedmen lâaô di tlawin nnwen, awit ed, fellasent, kué inagan nnwen. Ma cehhden d, kemnet pent di texxamin, alamma teddem itent tmeppant, ne$ Iga yasent Öebbi abrid.
Wid segwen it ixedmen, âaqbet pen. Ma nedmen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, anfet asen. Öebbi, s tidep, Izga Issuruf, Ipêunu.
Issuruf kan Öebbi i wid ixedmen cceôô ur éôin, sinna, steôoâen, war laâvil. Widak, ad asen Issuref Öebbi. Öebbi Izga d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw.
Ur illi usuref i wid ixedmen tucmitin. Alamma, mi d tusa yiwen tmeppant, a d yini: "nek steôoâe$ tura". Akken, wid immuten u nitni d ijehliyen. Widak, Nhegga yasen d aâaqeb aqeôêan.

A wid iumnen! Ur awen iêell ara a pweôten tilawin, ur qbilent, ne$ ad asent tekksem jjwao, iwakken a ppawim amur seg wayen i sent tefkam, siwa ma xedment lâaô ibanen. Illit yidsent, s lqanun. Ma tkeôhem tent, ahat tkeôhem ayen ideg Irra Öebbi lxiô meqqwôen.
Ma teb$am a pbedlem tameîîut s tayev, u tefkam tuççit i yiwet, ur as tekkset acemma. Ma tekksem, d ayen n dir u d abekkav n ûûeê.
Amek ara tekksem imi temyekcamem, u bbwint s$uôwen laâqed meqqwôen?
